tool_description: An API for Distant Quotes for any occasion.
title: Distant Quotes

api_list.name: Distant Quotes
api_list.description: An API to get distant quotes for any occasion
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://distant-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "distant-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
